entries: You learned the healing arts of your community wielding your ceremonial chonta, a tool you carved yourself and imbued with sacred oils and herbs. This process opened your eyes to ailments of a more mystical nature: malefic spirits, haunts, possession, and more. You likely took up adventuring to combat these horrors, or you may have fled an evil beyond your power to vanquish.
Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Constitution or Wisdom, and one is a free ability boost.
You're trained in the {@skill Medicine} skill and the {@skill Lore||Herbalism Lore} skill. You gain the {@feat Inoculation|APG} skill feat.
